channel.title: Demoscene on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Demoscene on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog

item.title: My old demos finally on YouTube
item.description: A friend of mine did something I was too lazy to do for a long time - a YouTube version of our old demos. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AWe1SmHWxE4 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7RbkCS2xtuU Seems like it was ages ago. I have great memories of these times, and have to admit I miss coding just for the pure fun of it. Commercial software development might be fun (especially when making games) but it’s really hard to compare.
